Views:
1 - Color
2 - Depth
3 - Normal
4 - Game

View controls:
Scroll - Zoom
Right drag - Pan
Double right click - Reset

Counter:
Left click - set counter to pixel
Middle click - copy counter from pixel
Alt + Scroll - adjust counter
Alt + Shift + Scroll - adjust counter + 10

Depth View:
U - Raise all depth values by the counter
D - Lower all depth values by the counter

Normal View:
Alt + F - Flip normal counter by 180
M - Mirror normals and depths from left to right

Game View:
Tab - toggle rendering mode
C - toggle color texture linear interpolation
N - toggle normal texture linear interpolation
Left click - set light angle
Shift + Left click - set ship angle
